mdRecord.dcterms:description: Detail view of main house entrance door surround, west front

Original portion of house built between 1839-1902 by H.A. and H. F. du Pont; central extension added 1929-1931 by Albert Ely Ives; additions between 1946 and 1962. House opened as a museum of American decorative arts, 1951. Gardens designed 1928-1960s by Marion Coffin and Henry Francis du Pont. [work]
